title: Textile, 1910–19
medium:
Medium: silk 
Technique: block printed on plain weave
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Off-set pattern of stars covers ground; floral forms sparsely arranged over top; (a) black stars, light blue and green flowers on ivory; (b) ivory stars on pale pink ground with dark pink and green flowers.
